title: No Reason To Stay
description: Alexandra Wainwright was unaware that the universe had important lessons to teach her. Now, at the age of forty-nine, as she gradually succumbs to illness, Alexandra retraces her steps through the decades of a life well lived. Set in the unspoiled mountains of the West Kootenays, this tender exploration brims with love and culminates with an illuminating discovery.
author: A.K. White
